wikipedia_page.main: Harold "Harry" Morton (9 January 1909 – 4 April 1974) was an English professional footballer who played as a goalkeeper for Aston Villa in the 1930s.

response: * Harry Morton (footballer) (1909–1974), English football goalkeeper for Aston Villa in the 1930s
* Harry Morton (restaurateur) (1981–2019), American restaurateur and founder of the restaurant chain Pink Taco
